author: Matthew Impelli
title: Family Names Baby 'Sanitizer' Amid Coronavirus Pandemic
description: "We will remember this period whenever we utter his name," the newborn's father said.
content:
A family in India recently decided to name their child Sanitizer during the coronavirus pandemic.
According to the Deccan Herald in India, Omveer Singh, the father, said that the name would act as the family's "contribution" in the fight against the coronavi… [+2029 chars]
